features: Perfect first car for the youngest drivers, the right size to grasp, push and roll; the round shape and adorable headlights are guaranteed to delight
A clean, contemporary design with bright, super-saturated, shiny colors that are child safe and won't chip; this fleet comes in four vibrant shades
Made from the highest quality ABS and with rubber wheels that won't mar furniture or floor, this roadster can handle even the most enthusiastic driver
Helps develop motor skills, pretend play, creativity, imagination, eye-hand coordination and physical confidence
Available in four attractive colors; Cherry Red, Grass Green, Aqua Blue and Peony Pink, for ages 12 months +
body.description: Product Description Product Description A perennial best seller for Kid O Toys, the Go Car is the perfect first car for the early vehicle enthusiast. The attractive modern, rounded design has no sharp edges, a pleasing tactile feel and adorable faux headlights. The unique rounded open roof doubles as an easy to grasp handle for superior hold, push and roll control. This is a substantial first car, solidly built with bright, vibrant color throughout that will not chip or fade. Color-safe and non-toxic it will stand up to the most active driver. The rubber coated wheels glide, slide and ride easily for hours of fun and won’t mar furniture or floor. Built in a perfect skill building size, the Go Car helps develop gross and fine motor skills, early pretend play, creativity, imagination, eye-hand coordination and physical confidence. The Go Car is available in four super-saturated, shiny colors; Cherry Red, Grass Green, Aqua Blue and Peony Pink. For ages 12 months +. Kid O Toys, the leader in contemporary developmental and educational toys, makes learning look like child’s play. Dedicated to child enrichment through toys that promote and nurture creativity and discovery, we make toys that are designed to delight and engineered to endure. With open-ended play that engage young minds, set imaginations free and celebrate a child’s innate brilliance. At Kid O, safety is paramount. Always PVC, Phthalate, BPA and lead free, our toys are tested by independent laboratories and conform to all US and European standards. From the Manufacturer A pushable, rollable, graspable vehicle gets young drivers excited. The gracefully curving roof does double-duty as a handle and rubber coated wheels glide smoothly along any path. Adorable faux headlights. High quality ABS plastic. Pushable, rollable, graspable. From the Manufacturer A pushable, rollable, graspable vehicle gets young drivers excited. The gracefully curving roof does double-duty as a handle and rubber coated wheels glide smoothly along any path. Adorable faux headlights. High quality ABS plastic. Pushable, rollable, graspable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Makes a great gift! Each Go Car comes in a nice box, so wrapping is a breeze if you're giving it as a gift! It's perfect for first birthdays and holidays! Get rollin' with Kid O Go Car! The perfect first car for any little motorist! The bright, shiny colors will excite any child! And, with its sleek design they’ll love “cruising” around the floor, table or driveway! Go Car can handle any driving test! Easy to grab, push and roll! Helps develop motor skills, hand-eye coordination and more! Available in a variety of colors! The white may seem simple, but turn out the lights and see it glow in the dark!

Beautifully designed toy for imaginative and developmental play! Kids love that it's a fun toy, and parents love the smooth shape that doesn’t have any sharp edges! Go Car rolls easily, with rubber wheels won’t scratch or scuff floors or furniture! The top of the car is also a handle, so it's easy for kids to hold and carry, and easy for parents to grab when it's time for toy cleanup!
Kid O Tug Boat Kid O Tip Truck Kid O Airplane Kid O Myland Car Kid O Myland Fire Truck Mirari myStorymaker For ages: 1Y+ 1Y+ 1Y+ 2Y+ 2Y+ 12M+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Go kid go!
reviews.reviewText: LOVE this adorable, well made, bright, entertaining toy! My 10 month old Grandson has so much fun with it! His little hands can grab it perfectly & he has alot of fun pushing it around the carpet or wood flooring while "walking" on his knees semi-upright ;) great quality, super colorful, smooth & perfect toy for boy or girl!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for little hands
reviews.reviewText: This car can handle being knocked around by little hands. It’s handle makes it easy for even my 8 month old to push around. It’s a great first car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: First off, the car is very cool and our 8-month old son likes it a lot. It's a good size for him, and the handle helps his grip.Now that that's out of the way, the main reason I'm reviewing this is to report the amazing customer service experience I had with Kid O. We bought one of the Go Cars a couple weeks ago, and two days later our Great Dane ate the tires off the car. Things like this happen constantly with the dog and yes, she's fine. So, I figured I'd have to suck it up and buy a new car or otherwise, let my son make due with the chewed, tireless wheels. Out of curiosity, I emailed Kid O to see if I could possibly obtain some replacement tires for the car. I got a response in a day, and although I was told that replacement tires weren't an option, the lovely woman told me they'd be happy to send us a new Go Car. I had no expectation of getting a replacement toy, nor was Kid O in any way obligated to do this. They just did it (with free shipping), which made me extremely happy. The replacement arrived the next day. I'll definitely seek out Kid O products in the future because of this experience (and because they make cool stuff).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and fun
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for rolling toys to help encourage my almost ten-month-old to start crawling. This car seemed like a cute, fun toy that she could keep enjoying as she gets older. It was a little smaller than I expected, but it is easy for her to hold on to. It seems very sturdy. She likes to inspect the headlights and spin (and chew on) the wheels. She still has no interest in crawling, even when the car rolls out of reach, but I'm still happy with the purchase. I might get the truck too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product, not quite as fun
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toy for my 10 month old boy who really loves toys with wheels. When he is at daycare, I can see him playing with trucks and cars pushing them around the whole room and never getting tired. Since every weekend he seemed to be bored a bit, I decided to get toys with wheels for his own.I don't like fancy shiny over-stimulating toys. So I usually avoid anything with batteries and too much buttons. And my boy also loves simple toys.When I ordered this one, I loved how it looks, I loved the smooth design and firm grip. It seemed to be the perfect car for my boy. However, there was one thing I ignored. The feedback from the toy.This toy doesn't have a haptic feedback when you push it around-which means the wheels are super smooth. It might be great for kids who like to push things away and pay, but my boy is the type who like to grab and play, which haptic toys make much fun.Other toys in daycare has this grrrr doodle daddle feeling when you grab and push it around on the floor, this makes it much interesting and motivates hime to crawl all around the floor. This toy is like 3 crawls and thats it. Nothing interesting going on.If you are searching for simplicity and simplicity only, this is the perfect toy for you. But if you want one more step from plain bricks and wheels, there might be something better out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We call him Speedy because he was quickly loved
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this car. One of the answers to the questions on this product says this is a 3WD vehicle: two knees and one hand. Absolutely correct! This is the PERFECT car for a baby to toddler. As soon as my 9 month old got it he picked it up with a huge smile and just instinctively started to push it around and crawl with it. It rolls very smoothly on hardwood flooring and is a great size for baby hands. The handle is perfect and babies can easily pick it up. The color is vibrant and your baby will be drawn to it.If there is any drawback, and it's not the car's fault, it is that babies will love banging this car on furniture and such. So just be aware that this car isn't lightweight plastic junk. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy toy and easy to use. Makes a great gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really cute and a great toy.
reviews.reviewText: My grandson has so many toys not sure he will play with it much anymore. But it's great for taking along on a trip. Get two you can have one for yourself and have races or wrecks
This was exactly what I was looking for for my cousin this Christmas. They absolutely love this at the local library. It arrived very quickly so it made his Christmas!
Produit résistant et bien fini. Mon fils adore ces petites voitures. La prise en main est bonne
Good quality, perfect for 6-7 month old babies. Easy to hold. No protruding parts and quality of plastic is good too. It is a push type toy car
Cute and compact-my one year old likes it and it is easy for him to hold. Encourages independent movement.
